summary: Implemented a client-side password prompt gate that appears before any admin authentication/authorization UI on the /admin route, with an English error message on incorrect entry and no persistence of the password across refreshes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated project metadata tracking new feature requests (AR-1/AR-2) and architectural notes in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to implement an admin password prompt gate; it did not request updating project tracking/metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/maintained a repository-level summary file describing many unrelated frontend changes (theme, multiple pages/components/hooks).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest scope is limited to adding a password gate on /admin; the diff includes edits to a summary file that documents broader changes not requested.
